data.title: Convert MUR to USD
data.meta_description: Instant free online tool for MUR to USD conversion or vice versa. The MUR [Mauritian Rupee] to USD [United States Dollar] conversion table and conversion steps are also listed. Also, explore tools to convert MUR or USD to other currency units or learn more about currency conversions.
data.text:

1 United States Dollar = 46.27 Mauritian Rupee
